title: Freckle juice
brief_description: Animated version of a book by Judy Blume. Andrew Marcus is the kind of second grader that gets noticed for all the wrong reasons. Andrew has one simple wish. He wants lots of freckles all over his face and neck, just like Nicky, the boy who sits next to him. Unfortunately, Sharon, the class practical joker recognises Andrew’s freckle fixation.
